name: Bear vs. Human
description:
A bear has gone loose in the city, and one of them wants to eat the humans! Which one is it though?

Inspired by Hidden in Plain Sight, play as a human (or bear) amongst a crowd of similarly-looking humans and bears. Find out where you or your opponent are and try to stay hidden! If you're playing as the bear, you have 3 chances and 2 minutes to catch the human trying to run away! But watch out before the cops take you...

Controls: WASD for bear to move, Space to swat at humans, and arrow keys for human to move.
